Text:
"You can only talk rubbish if you're aware of knowledge"

- Karl Pilkington

(One of my favorite quotes by The "Man" (Monkey?), though I don't know why, or even what it means....)

this is by far the best torrent on this site.

Just to say thank you so much for this! 

I'm completely new to this - I just spent pretty much a full day going through the XFM/ Ricky Gervais archive, streaming each little bit, and recording it simultaneously before thinking - hang on, someone must have already done this... which led me to find out about BitTorrent, and get this. 

So thanks again for saving me about a week of sitting in front of the computer and getting up every five minutes so start a new stream.
cheers pilki. great download

Alright. Just wanted to let you know that I appreciate this a lot. Good work and that. Alright?

Great collection, all tagged correctly and dated, which is fantastic. My only concern is of the quality - while most are 128kbps which is more than adequate for voice recording, there are a handful from season 1 and 2 that are 32kbps, and episode 6 is 16kbps - almost unlistenable!

I understand though that these were recorded from a streaming web source so if thats the best quality available, then fair enough - but why the inconsistency? 

Anyway, thank you very much for your hard work collecting all this together, and sharing!

Thanks man. 92 hours of the phenomenon thats called Karl Pilkington.
